basic.Peptide Name: Human defensin-6 (HD-6; Defensin, alpha 6; Human, mammals, animals)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.34206990]Virus:SARS-CoV-2:inhibition of infection in HEK293T-hACE2 cells(HD6 only blocked SARS-CoV-2 infection at the highest concentration tested (50 μg/mL, 13 μM)).Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 8739 (vLD50>256 µg/ml), E. coli ATCC 25922 (vLD50=103±14 µg/ml), Enterobacter aerogenes ATCC 13048 (vLD50=156±11 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923 (vLD50>256 µg/ml), S. aureus ATCC 29213 (vLD50>256 µg/ml), Bacillus cereus ATCC 10876 (vLD50=25±13 µg/ml).(Ref.3)NOTE:vLD50, virtual lethal doses (vLDs), equivalent to conventional 50% lethal doses (LD50s).
